subject: Medicine
title: The Wine Tasting Experiment
description: A quick win: understand The Wine Tasting Experiment.

hook.text: The same wine tastes different depending on its price tag.

buildup.text: Researchers gave people identical wine with different labels.

discovery.text: Participants rated the expensive label as tasting much better.

twist.text: Brain scans showed more pleasure activity for the pricey label.

climax.text: The brain literally processed the same wine differently.

quiz.question: What did brain scans show about wine with a higher price label?
